name: LetterGame(UnderstandingLetters)
0:
”Alexa, Open Letter Game”
”Alexa, Start Letter Game”
”Alexa, Play Letter Game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: letter game
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Letter Game is designed to help parents teach early literacy skills in a safe, natural, and engaging way!

The Letter Game works on three important early literacy skills (3 levels per literacy skill and 10 questions per level) as follows:
- Letter names (identify the names of letters)
- Letter sounds (identify the sounds of letters)
- Letter blends (identify combination of letters that make a sound)

To skip ahead:
- Start Over -Say, “New Game”
- New Game - Say, “Letter Names” or “Letter Sounds” or “Letter Blends”
- New Level - Say, “Next Level” or “Previous Level”

By combining voice technology and real-world, tangible play, SayKid helps families learn together in a safe, natural, and engaging way. Search "SayKid" on the Alexa Skill store for additional learning experiences. 

If you found the skill helpful, we greatly appreciate reviews!

Awards
- SayKid wins Grand Prize in the 2020 Alexa EdTech Competition 
- Harvard names SayKid a Finalist in the Saul Zaentz Early Education Competition
- SayKid wins MN Cup "Moonshot" Prize at US Bank Stadium
priv:
